data.title: ERP Developer Information Services at WakeMed
data.meta_description: Learn more about applying for ERP Developer Information Services at WakeMed
data.text:
About WakeMed:

Serving the community since 1961, WakeMed Health & Hospitals is the leading provider of health services in Wake County. With a mission to improve the health and well-being of our community, we are committed to providing outstanding and compassionate care. For more information, visit www.wakemed.org.

EOE

Position Information:

Responsible for designing developing testing and maintaining enterprise resource planning (ERP) software solutions that support various business functions such as Finance Human Resources and Supply Chain Management in our Infor/ERP suite of products. Works closely with operational leaders business analysts end users and other developers to understand the requirements design the architecture implement the features and ensure the quality of the ERP software. Provides preventative and proactive maintenance and monitoring of the Infor/ERP system and applications job monitoring and recovery hardware optimization and planning application patches and upgrades protection of the data including disaster recovery and data restoration planning and provides high-level support to end-users to resolve systems issues and is the point of contact for Infor/ERP. Develops and writes interfaces/IPAs to successfully achieve business/technical requirements. A working knowledge of business processes is essential. The business knowledge in conjunction with hardware knowledge Infor CloudSuite application and AIX/Unix functionality knowledge is required to support the day-to-day operations of the applications. Analyze design develop test and debug Infor/ERP software solutions using various technologies and tools such as SQL C# ASP.NET JavaScript HTML CSS XML etc. integrate ERP software with other systems and applications using APIs web services and data exchange formats optimize ERP software performance security and scalability using best practices and standards document ERP software specifications code test cases and user manuals provide technical support and troubleshooting for ERP software issues and defects collaborate with business analysts end users and other developers to gather feedback identify improvements and deliver solutions stay updated with the latest trends and developments in ERP software and related technologies.

Experience Requirements:

3 Years Information Technology - Application Support - ERP And/Or Information Technology - Application Development Required - And 3 Years Healthcare - Multi-Hospital System Preferred

Education Required:

Bachelor's Degree Business Or Finance Or Technology Or Related Field Required

Licensure/Certification Requirements:

Certified/Licensed/Registered in Field of Practice Preferred

Hours of Work:

Monday-Friday 8:00am-5:00pm

Weekend Requirements:

No Weekends
